name: Américas Benidorm Hotel
address: Rua Barata Ribeiro, 547, Rio de Janeiro
description: Near Copacabana Beach and featuring scenic views of Christ the Redeemer and the Sugarloaf, this hotel provides a rooftop pool, and gym. WiFi is free. Parking is available at an additional price. Bright and spacious, the air-conditioned rooms at Benidorm Palace display local paintings and framed artwork. They all offer cable TV and a well-supplied minibar, while suites also feature a private sauna and hot tub. Guests can enjoy continental breakfast in Benidorm Palace´s stylish restaurant. Siqueira Campos Metro Station is 550 metres away. Copacabana Fort is 2.4 km from Benidorm Palace Hotel. Santos Dumont Airport is 10 km from the property and Galeão International Airport is at a distance of 22.6 km.Read less

name: Hotel Bandeirantes
address: Rua Barata Ribeiro 548 Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22040-000
description: Just 500 metres from Rio de Janeiro’s Copacabana Beach, Hotel Bandeirantes offers a rooftop pool and air-conditioned rooms. Amenities include a gym and a sauna. WiFi is free. Featuring beautiful contemporary interiors, this 3-star hotel provides bright and spacious accommodation. It supplies a modern bathroom, plus cable TV, telephone and minibar. Room service is available. In a pleasant area decorated with classic paintings, guests enjoy buffet breakfast with a variety of tropical fruits, juices, breads and cakes. À la carte Brazilian dishes are served for lunch and dinner. Exotic drinks can be ordered from the bar. Siqueira Campos metro station is 550 metres from Hotel Bandeirantes, whilst Copacabana Fort is 2.2 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 8.7 km and Galeão International Airport is 25.5 km from the property.Read less

name: Hotel Astoria Copacabana
address: Rua Republica Do Peru 345, Rio de Janeiro 22021-040
description: Located just 300 meters from Copacabana beach, in Rio de Janeiro, Hotel Astoria Copacabana features an outdoor pool, gym and sauna. Featuring a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers currency exchange for guests. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and minibar. The buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining area. Hotel Astoria Copacabana offers accommodation with a sauna and sun terrace. The 24-hour front desk can arrange hiking trips, shuttle and laundry services. Hotel Astoria is conveniently located only 350 metres from Cardeal Arcoverde tube station, 9.6 km from Santos Dumont Airport and 18 km from Galeao International Airport.Read less

name: South American Copacabana Hotel
address: Francisco Sá, 90, Rio de Janeiro 22080-010
description: South American Copacabana is 250 metres from Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. Rio de Janeiro’s breathtaking skyline can be enjoyed from the sun terrace, by the pool. WiFi is free. Rooms at South American Copacabana boast a contemporary décor, featuring a minibar and a 32” LCD TV with cable access. Some offer a spa pool and additional living areas. Non-smoking room are available. South American Copacabana Hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the luxurious restaurant. It offers a selection of hot meals, tropical fruits and breads. Rio de Janeiro’s breathtaking skyline can be enjoyed from the sun terrace, by the pool. This 4-star hotel features a well-equipped gym, sauna and a lounge bar with desktop computers available to guests. General Osorio metro station is 350 metres from the hotel, whilst Copacabana Fort is 1 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 12 km and Galeão International Airport is 23.5 km from the propertyRead less

name: Hotel Atlantico Business Centro
address: Rua Senador Dantas, 25, Rio de Janeiro 20031-202
description: Hotel Atlântico Business is located in downtown Rio de Janeiro, 200 metres from the stately Theatro Municipal. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and a rooftop sun deck with splendid views. The buffet breakfast offers a large variety of options. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at Business Hotel Atlântico are equipped with LCD TVs, air conditioning and a laptop safe. Additionally, they offer a work desk and are tastefully styled with natural and light wood décor. Guests can also sample some local and international specialties at the restaurant. A fitness centre and 24-hour business centre are available. After a relaxing hot tub or sauna session, guests can enjoy a refreshing drink from the bar or order from the room service menu. There is a bike-sharing station nearby. Just 200 meters from the hotel lies the Cinelandia metro station. The stunning Gloria Marina is at a distance of 3 km. Copacabana beach is 7 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 1.2 km and Galeão International Airport is 18 km from the property.Read less

name: Mar Palace Copacabana Hotel
address: Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, 552, Rio de Janeiro 22020-000
description: Located 230 metres from the trendy Copacabana Beach, Mar Palace Copacabana Hotel offers accommodation in Rio de Janeiro. Free WiFi is available. Guests will find a swimming pool, as well as panoramic views of the Corcovado and the Christ Statue. A complimentary breakfast is served daily. This 4-star hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with 32" cable TV. Bathroom is fitted with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Inside the Mar Palace Copacabana, guests will also find a restaurant, a business center and a couple of computers with internet access. Siqueira Campos metro station is 500 metres from Mar Palace, whilst Lagoa Stadium is 4.8 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 8 km and Galeão International Airport is 24.8 km from the property.Read less

name: Windsor Excelsior Copacabana
address: Avenida Atlantica 1800, Rio de Janeiro 22021-001
description: Situated in front of Copacabana beach, Windsor Excelsior offers panoramic views of the ocean and the Sugarloaf. A rooftop terrace with pool, bar and gym is one of its highlights. Windsor Excelsior Copacabana features tasteful rooms with contemporary décor. Spacious and bright, they all have air conditioning, cable TV, WiFi and minibar, while some also offer sea views and a hot tub. Room service is available 24 hours a day. At the restaurant, guests enjoy tropical breakfast with various items, while admiring stunning sea views. Lunch and dinner options are provided as well, featuring Brazilian and international specialities. Amenities include dry and steam sauna units next to the fitness centre. Cardeal Arcoverde metro station is 60 metres from Windsor Excelsior. Beach Volleyball Arena 800 metres away, and Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 9.4 km.Read less

name: Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro

description: Boasting an out-door pool and a spa, Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro is located in the heart of Barra da Tijuca, between the ocean, the lake and the mountains, just across the street from Reserva Beach. The hotel has a sauna and a fitness centre with a yoga studio. Guests can enjoy a meal at one of the three restaurants. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and offers a furnished balcony. Rooms also offer a bathtub, bathroom amenities and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and shops at the property. Beach service is available and offers chairs, parasols and towels. The spa offers different massages and treatments in its nine private suites. The spa also has locker rooms with saunas and steam rooms. Guests can also enjoy several resort activities such as daily physical activities, cocktail tasting, bike experience and welcome drinks at the restaurant, for an additional charge. Children can enjoy several toys, books, artistic activities, baby area and video games at our kids club. Jeunesse Arena is located nearby, whilst Cidade das Artes is 3.2 km. description: Ideally located in the dynamic business district of Barra da Tijuca, Hilton Barra Rio de Janeiro hotel is just moments from the Olympic Park. description: Ideally located in Gloria Neighbourhood, just 800 metres from Marina da Gloria and 1.3 km from Cinelândia, Golden Park Hotel Rio de Janeiro features an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi throughout the property. A daily buffet breakfast is served at Golden Park Hotel and includes a wide selection of fresh fruits, hot and cold beverages, breads,cakes and cold cuts. Guests can relax in the sauna or enjoy a drink by the bar. Meeting and business facilities are also available at the hotel. Santos Dumont Airport can be reached within 2.1 km and guests can enjoy the nightlife of Lapa Neighbourhood, located just 1.2 km from Golden Park Hotel.Read less

name: Américas Granada Hotel
address: Avenida Gomes Freire, 530 - Centro, Rio de Janeiro 20231-015
description: Américas Granada Hotel has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Rio de Janeiro. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At Américas Granada Hotel rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast. Américas Granada Hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Flamengo Beach, Escadaria Selarón and Municipal Theatre of Rio de Janeiro. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 2 km from Américas Granada Hotel.Read less

name: Orla Copacabana Hotel
address: Avenida Atlantica 4122, Rio de Janeiro 22070-002
description: Facing Copacabana Beach and within 800 metres from Ipanema Beach, Orla Copacabana Hotel features free WiFi, a rooftop pool and a restaurant. It offers panoramic views of Sugar Loaf Mountain and the ocean. Rooms at Orla Copacabana display neutral colours and modern décor. They provide air conditioning, cable TV and a minibar. Some also offer scenic ocean views. A rich buffet breakfast is served daily (which may or may not be included in the chosen rate) with international and regional dishes at the hotel's restaurant. The fitness centre provides beachfront views and a sauna is available for use. There is a 24-hour front desk and room service is also available. The property offers a WiFi of 500 MB. General Osório metro station is 900 metres from the 4-star hotel, which allows visitors to access other parts of Rio. Copacabana Fort is 600 metres away, and Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 12 km.Read less

name: Americas Barra Hotel
address: Avenida das Americas 10500, Rio de Janeiro 22793-082
description: Americas Barra Hotel is located in Rio de Janeiro's Barra da Tijuca district, 9.2 km from RioCentro Convention Centre. Boasting modern décor, each room here provides guests with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a minibar. Private bathroom also comes with a shower. Extras include bed linen. At Americas Barra Hotel guests will find a 24-hour front desk, room service and a bar. Guests can also enjoy local and international cuisine at the on-site restaurant. The hotel is 7.5 km from Recreio dos Bandeirantes Beach, and 9.3 km from HSBC Arena. Olympic Park is 8.5 km, while the Olympic Golf Court is 1.5 km from the property. Galeão International Airport is 36 km away.

name: Linx Galeão
address: Avenida 20 de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro 21941-900
description: Conveniently located only 500 m from Galeão - Tom Jobim International Airport in Rio de Janeiro, Linx Hotel has a 24-hour gym, pool and a bar. It is 15 km from central Rio. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a 32" LED TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hot shower. The daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Guests can also enjoy regional and international specialties, as well as a selection of drinks in the hotel’s restaurant. Linx Hotel International Airport Galeão also offers 24-hour free shuttle service and screens with flight hours. Guests can also benefit from the Mercato, a grab-and-go service for quick meals and snacks. It is set 17 km from Maracanã Stadium and 25 km from Copacabana.

name: Verano Stay Flat Trab E Relax
address: Rua Escultor Sergio Camargo, 50, Rio de Janeiro 22775-033
description: No description found

name: 439 Barrabela
address: Av. Lucio Costa 4700, Apto 439, Rio de Janeiro 22630-011
description: 439 Barrabela offers a beachfront apartment in Barra da Tijuca. Guests can enjoy a view to the ocean whilst relaxing by the pool. Other facilities at 439 Barrabela include a hot tub and a sauna. Free WiFi is available throughout. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is provided. The room and the living room are fitted with a split air conditioning. Bathroom is fitted with a shower. Free private parking is available on site. Barra Shopping is within 2 km. Santos Dumont Airport is 20 km away and Galeão International Airport is 25 km away.

name: Royalty Rio Hotel
address: Rua Barata Ribeiro 581, Rio de Janeiro 22051-001
description: Royalty Rio Hotel is set in the Copacabana district in Rio de Janeiro, 400 metres from Copacabana Beach and 7 km away from Sugarloaf Mountain. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. WiFi is offered free of charge in public areas. Each room is soundproof and equipped with air conditioning, minibar, flat-screen TV with cable channels and a working desk. Every unit includes a private bathroom. Royalty Rio Hotel also provide guests with free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and a communal sauna. Christ the Redeemer is 14 km from Royalty Rio Hotel, while Siqueira Campos Metro Station is 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star
address: Rua Prudente De Moraes, 729, Rio de Janeiro 22420-041
description: Situated one block from trendy Ipanema Beach, Mc Flats Ipanema is just 9 km from Santos Dumont Airport. Complete leisure facilities include an exclusive Maria Bonita Wellness Spa, modern gym and heated pool. The spacious apartments at Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star have wooden furnishings and floors, and kitchenettes with a microwave and oven. Some have private balconies. Open for lunch, the Spazziano Restaurant serves a menu with organic dishes. For dining, several restaurants and bars are within a 10 minute walk from the hotel. Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star is a 10-minute drive from Leblon Beach, and 20 km from Galeao Airport. It is also 20-minutes drive from Rio´s main bus terminal. Ipanema Beach Star offers both free Wi-Fi and complimentary parking.

name: BFC Suíte em Barra da Tijuca
address: 7897 Avenida das Américas 1407.1, Rio de Janeiro 22793-081
description: Located within the Barra da Tijuca district in Rio de Janeiro, BFC Suíte em Barra da Tijuca has air conditioning, a balcony, and lake views. There is an on-site restaurant, plus free private parking and free WiFi are available. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests. This aparthotel with mountain views features parquet floors, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the aparthotel. The accommodation is non-smoking. There is a snack bar, and a minimarket is also available. The aparthotel also features an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre for guests to relax in. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 22 km from BFC Suíte em Barra da Tijuca, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 31 km from the accommodation.

name: Riostay Residence - Riocentro
address: R. Pedro Calmom 98, Rio de Janeiro 22783-145
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, a hot tub and a hammam, RioStay Residence - Riocentro is set in Rio de Janeiro, 29 km from Maracanã Stadium and 30 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens. This aparthotel features free private parking and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers a sauna, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms. The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Some units also have a well-fitted kitchen equipped with a microwave and kitchenware. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels. Guests may eat in the on-site modern restaurant, which is open for dinner, lunch, brunch and cocktails. Guests at the aparthotel can work out in the fitness room or relax in the spa and wellness centre, equipped with a steam room and a solarium. For guests with children, RioStay Residence - Riocentro provides outdoor play equipment. Kids pool is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 32 km from RioStay Residence - Riocentro, while Tijuca Forest National Park is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 35 km from the aparthotel.

name: Apartamento Marina
address: Estrada Do Pontal, 7100 apto 220, Rio de Janeiro 22790-877
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro with Pontal Beach and Recreio dos Bandeirantes nearby, Apartamento Marina features accommodation with free private parking, as well as access to a hot spring bath. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel provides a pool with a view with a pool bar, as well as a sauna and a shared kitchen. The aparthotel is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. The property offers mountain views. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. A children's playground is also available at the aparthotel, while guests can also relax in the garden. Macumba Beach is 700 metres from Apartamento Marina, while Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Reserva Pontal Beach
address: Estrada Do Pontal, 585 Bloco 1, Rio de Janeiro 22790-877
description: LUXURY APARTMENT FACING THE SEA OF RECREIO DOS BANDEIRANTES fully furnished with high quality furniture and utensils to offer maximum comfort to its guests. Full kitchen equipped with stainless steel stove, stainless refrigerator, stainless microwave oven, sandwich maker grill, espresso coffee maker, cold water filter, glassware, plates and cutlery, etc. Common Areas: Adult and Children's Pools Discovered, Cold Hydromassage, Hot Hydromassage, Sauna, Gourmet Space, Zen Space, Games Room, Gym, Elevator, Concierge, Children's Space, Etc.VRBO
